body.name: 2 Pack for Galaxy S24 Ultra Screen Protector, 9H Tempered Glass, Fingerprint Unlock, Tempered Glass Screen Protector Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra [With Easy Installation Frame]
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 27 mins
features: COMPATIBLE MODEL: Our Galaxy S24 Ultra screen protector is carefully designed to fit your Samsung Galaxy S24+ perfectly. The tempered glass film is easy to apply and will not create air bubbles. It can drastically reduce your film application time.

High-quality hardness: This Galaxy S24 Ultra screen protector has been tempered for more than 3 hours to achieve the ideal 9H hardness shatterproof design, so it can protect the screen from accidental shattering into pieces.

ANTI-FINGERPRINT, HIGH-DEFINITION, HIGH-SENSITIVITY: The Galaxy S24 Ultra features a durable oleophobic coating that provides a smooth and sensitive touch, effectively eliminating fingerprints, and other substances. If there are any smudges, they can be easily wiped clean. The screen maintains a high level of touch sensitivity without compromising the phone's performance, making it ideal for mobile gaming。

KEEP YOUR EYES COMFORTABLE: Compared to other screen protectors on the market that offer only 80% light transmission, our screen protector offers nearly 95% light transmission, allowing you to view your screen comfortably while maintaining the original display. It also features an anti-glare coating that reduces eye pain.

200-Day Warranty: Your order comes with a 200-day limited warranty. If you need any help, we are here to support you. NOTE: This screen protector is only for Galaxy S24+. For other models, please visit HALLOIVE flagship store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Protective with some issues!
reviews.reviewText: This glass protector is sturdy and durable and provides good protection for my phone. The instructions on how to install it are not very clear. I managed to do it but not by following the instructions. The kit comes with alcohol pads and a cleaning cloth to prepare your screen. It also includes a frame like device that helps you align the glass over your phone screen when applying. The two drawbacks of the screen protector are that they affect the fingerprint sensor performance a bit even after turning on the increased sensitivity option on my phone. I also re-registered my fingerprints through the glass. It still works but makes unlocking slightly more difficult. If you use face recognition, then this would not be an issue. The other drawback is that the S24 has a new Gorilla glass that reduces reflections. With the glass screen protector on, the screen reflects more and diminishes the new screen that is really impressive. This screen protector has advantages and disadvantages. It is very protective but comes with some trade-offs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Is not compatible with s24 ultra!
reviews.reviewText: No matter what I did, the phone will not recognize my current fingerprint or allow me to put new fingerprints into the phone. A notification popped up that said, "if you are using a screen protector, make sure that it is ultrasonic compatible." Clearly this one is not. Took it off and returned it. Waste of my time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This screen protector is a square sheet of plastic. The screen of my galaxy s24 ultra is not square so the corners of the screen protector sticks out. There are also air bubbles on the screen. I laid the screen protector down several times and the air bubbles are there every time, in the same spot. They will not go away.. I'm not impressed with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good screen protector
reviews.reviewText: Screen protector is something I always put on my phone first. Since the s24 ultra comes with flat screen. It makes to install glass protector alot easier and it actually sticks. Good adhesive around the protector, fits nicely. Screen is still very responsive. I don't use finger print so I have no issues with the reader at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Honestly, pretty average
reviews.reviewText: Good for backup but otherwise nothing crazy, sseems to work okay with fingerprint at times really iffy same with clarity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfectly, easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Following the instructions, this was simple to install by lining it up inside the frame and dropping the glass onto the clean phone. As with all of these screen protectors, it's important your phone is clean and dust free and you install in a relatively clean, dust free environment to minimize the chance of something getting caught between the phone and glass during installation. What I did was drop the glass from one side and let it gently settle down at an angle to let the adhesive adhere across the screen like a pool of spreading water, which I find minimizes the chance of a rogue air bubble. If you do get an air bubble, all is not lost as you can gently pry up one side and lower it again as long as you didn't press down on the glass after dropping it. You can do this a couple times to get it perfect, just make sure you're slow and gentle. Again, I have to stress having a dust free place to do this is very important if you don't want to drive yourself insane. Once it's on there, it feels just like the phone's actual screen and does not interfere with performance in any way I can notice, including the fingerprint sensor. I've removed and put on various cases and the protector has not budged. I've not tested its durability, but mostly I just want to avoid scuffs and scratches on the screen from other things in my pocket, so for that, it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Frame didn't fit my phone, protector was NOT edge to edge, wasted my old protector for nothing..
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this as a back-up incase another protector I purchased didn't work. I have been trying many protectors lately trying to find one that would properly fit + not get dust under it. Sadly my first choice didn't work out, so I tried this one. Not only does the "alignment frame" not fit my phone, the screen protector also did not go edge to edge, resulting in it being incompatible for me. I use my S pen alot and the S pen would slip right off this constantly at the edges onto the screen of the phone.. The product needs to be redesigned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit and but..
reviews.reviewText: It is tricky because the phone screen needs to be very clean before installing this protector. Always start from one corner then slowly lower and press down it in place. It stays in place one I have it on.
